item.description:
We will have a meeting to decompress after the NH Primary, review what worked and what didn't, and then plan out the next steps for the MA Primary which is coming up in Feb. Please let me know if you would like to attend and I'll email you directions.

Thanks,
Brooke
item.how_to_find_us: Please email me if you would like to come. Also, I'm about a mile from the commuter rail terminal so if someone wants to take the train up (Scott) then I can come pick you up or give you walking instructions.
item.name: Post NH Primary Breakdown and MA Primary Strategy Session For Meetup Organizers
